entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:52 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:52 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
